description: A group of 25 women file a complaint against the man, known for his tag "love runs the streets".
title: Parisian graffiti artist accused of rape and sexual assault
title_page: Parisian graffiti artist accused of rape and sexual assault - BBC News
maintext: Ms Reb¨¦rioux said he had a pattern, contacting each of them "for professional purposes, boasting about his fame and influence". He then offered to help them and sent them an address which was in reality his home, she said.
